abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed credit's major
            objective would be to help the Government carry out the
            first phase (1986-88) of its medium-term industrial
            adjustment program, which aims at: (a) increasing production
            of locally manufactured goods through greater use of
            existing capacity; (b) streamlining Ghana's industrial
            capacity, through:  (i) appropriate incentive policies; and
            (ii) proceeding cautiously with rehabilitation of
            economically viable industries; and (c) strengthening key
            institutions in the industrial sector to undertake policy
            analysis, credit delivery and investment analysis.
